d2p1:KeyValueOfstringanyType.d2p1:Value: The Key to Secure Online Financial Transactions

AhnLab Online Security (AOS) is designed exclusively to provide security for online transactions. Regardless of the security protocols used on a local computer, AOS provides complete security for the online transaction. It is a proven web transaction security solution of 15 years which monitors and responds quickly against the numerous hackers who attempt illegal financial transactions and steal financial information.

Unlike a typical single-purpose security solution, AOS combines three key security elements into an innovative security solution that prevents the leakage of information and thwarts attempts to compromise online financial transactions.

AOS is comprised of 4 security services which include Anti-keylogger, Firewall, Anti-virus/spyware and Secure Browser. The services ensure that advanced security features are in place to safeguard users’ financial and personal information.

System Requirements

System Requirements Details
CategoryRequirements
Hardware
  • Intel Pentium4 2.8GHz or higher
  • Memory 512 MB or higher (Recommend 1G or higher)
  • HDD 500MB or higher (1GB or higher)
OS Windows XP ~ Windows 8.1 (64bit: Vista, 7, 8)
Browser

Internet Explorer 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 (Windows)

Firefox 29.0 and higher *

Chrome 34.0 and higher *

Safari 5.0 and higher

Opera 21.0 and higher *
Install Method ActiveX, EXE, Plug-in, SDK (Software Development Kit)
Language Support Korean, English

※ AOS can run on the browsers marked with * in lower versions but for the complete features to run, it is recommended to run on the version and higher indicated.

※ Above information is common system requirement for AhnLab Online Security. For OS and browser support information for AOS Firewall, please contact the technical support at AhnLab.

AhnLab Online Security

provides strong security features to prevent memory hacking, webpage alteration and screen capturing. It is an easy-to-implement solution without a separate program installation but runs once connected to the website.

AhnLab Online Security Advantages Details
CategoryAdvantages
Strong Security Features Provides prevention features on memory hacking, webpage alteration and screen capturing.
Multi-Browser Supports multiple browsers such as Internet Explorer 6.0 and higher, Firefox, chrome, Safari and Opera.
Easy-to-implement Total user-friendly interface with one step install/uninstall, service is available with the initial program install.
Customized Service 4 services can be selectively installed via various kinds of install methods such as by ActiveX, EXE, Plug-in and SDK (Software Development Kit)
Lightweight and fast speed Enjoy lightweight and fast speed with the V3 engine.
Self-Protection Self-Protection protects product from incapacitation due to hacking or from abnormal terminations.
Bluetooth keyboard Supports Bluetooth keyboard as well as PS/2 and USB
Systemic Customer Service No.1 security solutions in Korea with 20 years of emergency response knowhow and professional support service

- Reduced Costs: AOS can be implemented seamlessly into existing websites. Not only does it reduce costs and labor in the implementing process, but it also reduces costs of potential claims by users. By reducing the incidence of security events and fraud claims, businesses can also benefit from higher productivity.

- Easy-to-Use, Simple UI: AOS' complex and sophisticated technology is wrapped in user-friendly interface. Instant messaging provides notifications of attacks or intrusion attempts and simple configurations allow it to work in the background without interfering with activity on the website.
